oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
Workers at the intersection of Kentucky Avenue and East Tennessee Avenue
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Five men at an intersection; one man is working on a drainage trench. Two buildings are on one road, a house and another building is on the hill above.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Construction; Construction workers; East Tennessee Avenue; Kentucky Avenue; Oak Ridge High School (Tenn.); Oak Ridge Public Library; Ridge Hall; Town Hall; Utility poles
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ridge Hall was the location of Oak Ridge Public Library and the Welfare and Recreation Association. Town Hall was the location to obtain security badges and gate passes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Physical rights are retained by the institution. Copyright is retained in accordance with U. S. Copyright laws.
